attributes.action: Stop BBC3 becoming on line only
attributes.additional_details:
We wish the goverment to stop the proposed plans to make BBC3 an online channel only.
 BBC3 has proven itself as a showcase for great new talent and shows attracting a large audience. To see this channel go online only will destroy a great showcase for new talent and great well loved shows by restricting viewers who will require online access.THIS CANT BE ALLOWED

rejection.details: This is an operational matter for the BBC.
